channel.title: Highscores - HELP
channel.description:
I need help with the Highscores I'm making, I've been following this tutorial here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,364364.0.html I'm using InsanityX [PI]. I've done everything up to Chapter 3 - Server sided, Step 3. Then I got completely lost. Here is the bit I am lost with
Step 3: Now we need to create a saving method so that it updates when players log out. Fist open server class (server.java) and in the run method Code (Java): [Select] public void run() Add: Code (Java): [Select] SQL.createConnection(); Open client.java and find your logout method. Code: [Select] public void logout() { Add Code: [Select] SQL.saveHighScore(this); Save and compile and you are done adding highscores [u][b]Project Insanity Information[/b][/u] Put SQL class in the util folder, in SQL class change saveHighScore(client clientToSave) to saveHighScore(Client clientToSave) Project Insanity's Server class doesn't have a run method, so put SQL.createConnection(); in the main method Code (Java): [Select] [code]public static void main(java.lang.String args[])[/code] At the top of SQL class you import Client class Code (Java): [Select] [code]import server.model.players.Client; [/code]And at the top of Client class and Server class import SQL class Code (Java): [Select] [code]import server.util.SQL;[/code] You also have to declare SQL's package (In SQL class) Code (Java): [Select] [code]package server.util;[/code]
I also need to follow the Project insanity steps as well, can someone teamviewer and help me do this? Thanks

item.title: Highscores - HELP
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

xD ok

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores - HELP
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:2, topic:445534”]- SpoonFeed -

1)Open server.java
2)Now some were near the top add public static void main(java.lang.String args[])
3)Now scroll to the top of SQL.java and add this in import server.model.players.Client; with all the other imports
4) In client.java and server.java import this import server.util.SQL;
5) final step in SQL.java at the very 1st line add package server.util;

Now if you couldnt follow this you sir are a Noob :)[/quote]

I figured this out before, but I couldn’t delete this post
Thanks for the help anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Highscores - HELP
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

  • SpoonFeed -

1)Open server.java
2)Now some were near the top add public static void main(java.lang.String args[])
3)Now scroll to the top of SQL.java and add this in import server.model.players.Client; with all the other imports
4) In client.java and server.java import this import server.util.SQL;
5) final step in SQL.java at the very 1st line add package server.util;

Now if you couldnt follow this you sir are a Noob

item.title: Highscores - HELP
item.dc:creator: @soapface soapface
item.description:
@soapface wrote:

I need help with the Highscores I’m making, I’ve been following this tutorial here

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


I’m using InsanityX [PI].

I’ve done everything up to Chapter 3 - Server sided, Step 3.
Then I got completely lost. Here is the bit I am lost with

Step 3: Now we need to create a saving method so that it updates when players log out. Fist open server class (server.java) and in the run method Code (Java): [Select] public void run() Add: Code (Java): [Select] SQL.createConnection();

Open client.java and find your logout method.
Code: [Select]
public void logout() {
Add

Code: [Select]
SQL.saveHighScore(this);

Save and compile and you are done adding highscores

Project Insanity Information

Put SQL class in the util folder, in SQL class change saveHighScore(client clientToSave) to saveHighScore(Client clientToSave)

Project Insanity’s Server class doesn’t have a run method, so put SQL.createConnection(); in the main method
Code (Java): [Select]

public static void main(java.lang.String args[])

At the top of SQL class you import Client class
Code (Java): [Select]

import server.model.players.Client; And at the top of Client class and Server class import SQL class
Code (Java): [Select]

import server.util.SQL;

You also have to declare SQL’s package (In SQL class)
Code (Java): [Select]

package server.util;

I also need to follow the Project insanity steps as well, can someone teamviewer and help me do this?
Thanks

Read full topic
